name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Fundamental concepts of programming and computational thinking. Topics include variables, control structures, functions, and basic data structures.

name: Business English Communication
description: Develop professional communication skills for business environments. Focus on presentations, negotiations, and written correspondence.

name: Calculus I
description: Introduction to differential calculus. Topics include limits, derivatives, and their applications to optimization problems.

name: Introduction to Psychology
description: Survey of fundamental concepts in psychology including perception, learning, memory, and human development.

name: Financial Accounting
description: Introduction to accounting principles and financial statement preparation. Covers the accounting cycle and basic financial analysis.

name: Organic Chemistry I
description: Study of carbon compounds and their reactions. Includes bonding, stereochemistry, and reaction mechanisms.

name: Marketing Fundamentals
description: Introduction to marketing concepts and strategies. Topics include market research, consumer behavior, and marketing mix.

name: Macroeconomics
description: Study of national economies, including GDP, inflation, unemployment, and monetary policy. Analyzes economic systems and policies.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Advanced programming concepts including arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, and algorithm analysis.

name: Introduction to Philosophy
description: Exploration of fundamental philosophical questions about knowledge, reality, ethics, and the meaning of life.

name: Technical Writing
description: Develop professional writing skills for technical and scientific contexts. Focus on reports, documentation, and proposals.

name: Physics I: Mechanics
description: Fundamentals of classical mechanics including kinematics, dynamics, energy, and momentum.

name: Introduction to Sociology
description: Study of human society, social institutions, and social behavior. Topics include culture, socialization, and social stratification.

name: Database Management Systems
description: Design and implementation of database systems. Covers SQL, normalization, and database administration.

name: Organizational Behavior
description: Study of individual and group behavior in organizations. Topics include motivation, leadership, and team dynamics.

name: Linear Algebra
description: Study of vectors, matrices, linear transformations, and eigenvalues. Applications in engineering and science.

name: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Introduction to web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and basic server-side programming.

name: Human Resource Management
description: Strategic approach to managing human resources. Covers recruitment, training, performance management, and compensation.

name: Statistics for Business
description: Application of statistical methods in business decision-making. Topics include probability, hypothesis testing, and regression.

name: Art History: Renaissance to Modern
description: Survey of Western art from the 14th century to the 20th century. Explores major movements and influential artists.

name: Microbiology
description: Study of microorganisms including bacteria, viruses, and fungi. Topics include microbial physiology, genetics, and disease.

name: Public Speaking
description: Development of oral communication skills for professional contexts. Includes speech preparation and delivery techniques.

name: Operating Systems
description: Study of operating system design and implementation. Topics include processes, memory management, and file systems.

name: Environmental Science
description: Study of environmental systems and environmental problems. Topics include ecosystems, pollution, and sustainability.

name: Discrete Mathematics
description: Mathematical structures for computer science. Topics include logic, sets, relations, combinatorics, and graph theory.

name: Principles of Management
description: Introduction to management principles and practices. Covers planning, organizing, leading, and controlling in organizations.

name: Criminal Justice System
description: Overview of the criminal justice system including law enforcement, courts, and corrections.

name: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Strategic approach to digital marketing. Covers SEO, social media marketing, content marketing, and analytics.

name: Computer Networks
description: Study of network protocols and architecture. Topics include TCP/IP, routing, and network security.

name: Corporate Finance
description: Advanced financial management topics including capital budgeting, working capital, and financial analysis.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Development of mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms using modern frameworks.

name: Ethics in Technology
description: Examination of ethical issues in technology including privacy, security, intellectual property, and artificial intelligence.

name: Project Management
description: Methodologies and tools for managing projects. Covers Agile, Scrum, and traditional project management approaches.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Introduction to AI principles and techniques. Topics include machine learning, neural networks, and natural language processing.

name: Creative Writing
description: Workshop in fiction, poetry, and creative nonfiction. Focus on developing personal voice and craft.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Design and deployment of cloud-based applications. Covers AWS, Azure, and cloud architecture patterns.

name: International Business
description: Study of global business environments and international trade. Covers cultural differences and global strategies.

name: Game Development
description: Design and programming of video games using industry-standard engines. Topics include game physics, AI, and level design.

name: Supply Chain Management
description: Management of supply chain operations from suppliers to customers. Topics include logistics, inventory, and sourcing.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Introduction to information security principles and practices. Topics include threats, vulnerabilities, and security controls.

name: Health and Wellness
description: Study of health promotion and disease prevention. Topics include nutrition, exercise, stress management, and lifestyle choices.

name: Business Law
description: Introduction to legal principles affecting business. Covers contracts, torts, and business organizations.

name: Machine Learning
description: Algorithms and techniques for machine learning. Includes supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and deep learning.

name: Organizational Leadership
description: Advanced study of leadership theories and practices. Develops leadership skills for complex organizational challenges.

name: UX Design
description: User experience design principles and methodologies. Includes user research, prototyping, and usability testing.

name: Sales Management
description: Strategic approach to personal and team selling. Covers sales techniques, account management, and sales force management.

name: Employment Law
description: Legal framework governing employment relationships. Covers discrimination, wages, benefits, and workplace safety.

name: DevOps Practices
description: Software development and IT operations integration. Covers CI/CD, containerization, and infrastructure as code.

name: Consumer Behavior
description: Study of consumer decision-making processes. Applies psychology and marketing principles to understand buyer behavior.

name: Investment Analysis
description: Portfolio management and investment analysis. Covers stocks, bonds, derivatives, and portfolio theory.

name: Data Science
description: Extraction of insights from data using statistical and computational methods. Covers data mining, visualization, and big data.

name: Interpersonal Communication
description: Effective communication in personal and professional relationships. Topics include active listening and conflict resolution.

name: Software Engineering
description: Software development lifecycle and methodologies. Covers requirements, design, testing, and project management.

name: Brand Management
description: Strategic brand building and management. Covers brand equity, positioning, and brand extensions.

name: Risk Management
description: Identification and management of organizational risks. Covers financial, operational, and strategic risks.

name: Visual Basic Programming
description: Introduction to programming using Visual Basic. Topics include GUI development and event-driven programming.

name: E-Commerce
description: Online business strategies and electronic commerce. Covers web analytics, digital payments, and online marketing.

name: Network Security
description: Protecting network infrastructure from threats. Covers firewalls, VPNs, intrusion detection, and security policies.

name: Advertising Strategy
description: Creative and media planning for advertising campaigns. Covers message development, media buying, and campaign evaluation.

name: Customer Relationship Management
description: Managing customer interactions and relationships. Covers CRM systems, customer analytics, and loyalty programs.

name: Information Systems
description: Role of information systems in organizations. Covers enterprise systems, decision support, and IT governance.

name: Systems Analysis
description: Methods for analyzing and designing information systems. Covers requirements gathering, modeling, and project scoping.

name: Retail Management
description: Operations and strategy in retail businesses. Covers store management, merchandising, and retail analytics.

name: Entrepreneurship
description: Starting and managing new ventures. Covers opportunity identification, business planning, and venture financing.

name: Hospitality Management
description: Overview of hospitality industry operations. Covers hotels, restaurants, and tourism management.

name: Training and Development
description: Design and delivery of employee training programs. Covers learning theories, program evaluation, and talent development.

name: Business Ethics
description: Ethical issues in business decision-making. Covers corporate social responsibility, stakeholder theory, and ethical frameworks.

name: Compensation Management
description: Design of employee compensation systems. Covers job evaluation, pay structures, and performance-based pay.

name: Sports Marketing
description: Marketing of sports organizations and events. Covers sponsorship, fan engagement, and sports media.

name: Healthcare Management
description: Management of healthcare organizations. Covers healthcare delivery systems, policy, and regulatory compliance.

name: Real Estate Finance
description: Financial aspects of real estate investment. Covers property valuation, mortgage financing, and REITs.

name: Nonprofit Management
description: Leadership and management of nonprofit organizations. Covers fundraising, volunteer management, and social enterprise.

name: International Marketing
description: Marketing strategies for global markets. Covers market entry, cross-cultural marketing, and international branding.

name: Financial Modeling
description: Excel-based financial analysis and forecasting. Covers valuation models, scenario analysis, and financial planning.

name: Service Marketing
description: Marketing of services versus products. Covers service quality, customer satisfaction, and service design.

name: Business Analytics
description: Data-driven business decision-making. Covers predictive analytics, optimization, and business intelligence.

name: Product Management
description: Lifecycle management of products and services. Covers product development, pricing, and portfolio management.

name: Negotiation
description: Theory and practice of negotiation. Covers distributive and integrative bargaining, and conflict resolution.

name: Enterprise Resource Planning
description: Implementation and use of ERP systems. Covers SAP, Oracle, and integrated business processes.

name: Managing Innovation
description: Management of innovation and technology. Covers innovation strategy, R&D management, and technology adoption.

name: Quality Management
description: Total quality management principles and practices. Covers Six Sigma, lean manufacturing, and continuous improvement.

name: Strategic Management
description: Formulation and implementation of corporate strategy. Covers competitive analysis, strategy development, and execution.

name: Business Consulting
description: Principles and practices of management consulting. Covers engagement management, diagnostic methods, and recommendations.

name: Mergers and Acquisitions
description: Financial and strategic aspects of M&A. Covers valuation, deal structure, and post-merger integration.

name: International Finance
description: Financial management in global markets. Covers exchange rates, international banking, and global investments.

name: e-Business Architecture
description: Technical architecture for electronic business. Covers web services, cloud architecture, and system integration.

name: Knowledge Management
description: Managing organizational knowledge assets. Covers knowledge creation, sharing, and organizational learning.

name: Supply Chain Strategy
description: Strategic design of supply chain networks. Covers supply chain design, coordination, and sustainability.

name: Procurement Management
description: Strategic sourcing and supplier management. Covers supplier selection, contracts, and supplier relationships.

name: Logistics Management
description: Transportation, warehousing, and distribution management. Covers logistics networks and inventory positioning.

name: International Management
description: Managing across borders and cultures. Covers global strategy, expatriate management, and cross-cultural leadership.
